show_name: A Good Librarian Like a Good Shepherd (TV)
plot: Kyōtarō Kakei has always had an affinity towards books in hopes to find answers to his life. With a mentor's promise, he continues to search for a book with his absolute hope. However, this changes when he receives a foretelling message saying that "Today, something will happen that will change your fate. --From the Shepherd." Due to this premonition, his normal school life at Shiomoi Academy becomes entangled due to the optimistic Tsugumi Shirasaki and the Shimoi Happy Project.
ending_theme: "Aozora to Green Belt" (青空とグリーンベルト) by Hagumi Nishizawa
